de.iss.mv2.client.gui

Class CertificateView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • de.iss.mv2.client.gui.CertificateView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class CertificateView
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    A control to display informations about a X509Certificate.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
